response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. We understand the importance of this decision to your organization, and we are confident that this product will provide substantial returns on your investment. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1100000}
